abstract: Expect to see new services and devices in cars and an explosion of business models that will go with the connected cars.
snippet: Expect to see new services and devices in cars and an explosion of business models that will go with the connected cars.

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Cadillac Division of General Motors Corp

lead_paragraph: SAN DIEGO -- Cars, one of the great mobile devices to begin with, are about to get connected to the Internet like never before. It will change not just how we drive, but the economics of the car business.

headline.main: The Next Boom in Mobile Devices Is the Car
